Summer Road Trip

This is the gallery of the photos I took during a self planned solo road trip in the summer of 2017. Overall, it took about 1.5 months, and was a total of 13,000 miles driven.

I made a rule where I would exclusivly camp in the US, and Hostel and Camp in Canada.
